nodes.text: Lucthz was a group of 4 Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports used by the Nami. They were attempting to destroy Modular conveyor Ulzepdi which was fleeing from an attack on the Imperial cargo area in the Yrrna system which was orchestrated by Ali Tarrak to demonstrate the power of TIE Defenders that she managed to acquire to the Rebels. The Transports were destroyed by Tan Maarek Stele who was sent to investigate the situation in a TIE Advanced starfighter.
